feature: The QIBOX bm-800 condenser microphone is ideal for radio broadcasting, voice-over sound studio, singing and recording, etc.
This is a great quality plug and play mic that connects directly to your computer or laptop through a 3.5mm audio plug
It produces crisp and clean sound, comparing to a number of models in the same price range
The QIBOX bm-800 condenser microphone is ideal for radio broadcasting, voice-over sound studio, singing and recording, etc.
This is a great quality plug and play mic that connects directly to your computer or laptop through a 3.5mm audio plug
It produces crisp and clean sound, comparing to a number of models in the same price range
It is a large diaphragm condenser mic with a smooth, uncolored sound
It measures 6.2 inches in length and 1.9 inches in diameter, it comes with its own shock mount which is a solid build
